00071 class SIM_API cSimulation : public cNoncopyableOwnedObject
00072 {
00073     friend class cSimpleModule;
00074 
00075   private:
00076     // global variables
00077     static cSimulation *simPtr; // the active cSimulation instance
00078     static cEnvir *evPtr;       // the active cEnvir instance
00079     static cEnvir *staticEvPtr; // the environment to activate when simPtr becomes NULL
00080 
00081     // variables of the module vector
00082     int size;                 // size of vector
00083     int delta;                // if needed, grows by delta
00084     cModule **vect;           // vector of modules, vect[0] is not used
00085     int last_id;              // index of last used pos. in vect[]
00086 
00087     // simulation vars
00088     cEnvir *ownEvPtr;         // the environment that belongs to this simulation object
00089     cModule *systemmodp;      // pointer to system (root) module
00090     cSimpleModule *activitymodp; // the module currently executing activity() (NULL if handleMessage() or in main)
00091     cComponent *contextmodp;  // component in context (or NULL)
00092     int contexttype;          // CTX_BUILD, CTX_EVENT, CTX_INITIALIZE or CTX_FINISH
00093     cModuleType *networktype; // network type
00094     cScheduler *schedulerp;   // event scheduler
00095 
00096     simtime_t sim_time;       // simulation time (time of current event)
00097     eventnumber_t event_num;  // sequence number of current event
00098 
00099     cMessage *msg_for_activity; // helper variable to pass the received message into activity()
00100     cException *exception;    // helper variable to get exceptions back from activity()
00101 
00102     cHasher *hasherp;         // used for fingerprint calculation
00103 
00104   private:
00105     // internal
00106     void checkActive()  {if (getActiveSimulation()!=this) throw cRuntimeError(this, eWRONGSIM);}
00107 
00108   public:
00109     // internal: FES
00110     cMessageHeap msgQueue;    // future messages (FES)
00111     cMessageHeap& getMessageQueue() {return msgQueue;}  // accessor for sim_std.msg
00112 
00113   public:
00120     cSimulation(const char *name, cEnvir *env);
00121 
00125     virtual ~cSimulation();
00127 
00134     virtual void forEachChild(cVisitor *v);
00135 
00139     virtual std::string getFullPath() const;
00141 
00147     static cSimulation *getActiveSimulation()  {return simPtr;}
00148 
00153     static cEnvir *getActiveEnvir()  {return evPtr;}
00154 
00160     static void setActiveSimulation(cSimulation *sim);
00161 
00166     static void setStaticEnvir(cEnvir *env);
00167 
00171     static cEnvir *getStaticEnvir()  {return staticEvPtr;}
00172 
00176     virtual cEnvir *getEnvir() const  {return ownEvPtr;}
00178 
00181 
00188     int registerModule(cModule *mod);
00189 
00194     void deregisterModule(cModule *mod);
00195 
00199     int getLastModuleId() const    {return last_id;}
00200 
00205     cModule *getModuleByPath(const char *modulepath) const;
00206 
00210     cModule *getModule(int id) const  {return id>=0 && id<size ? vect[id] : NULL;}
00211 
00217     _OPPDEPRECATED cModule& operator[](int id) const  {return id>=0 && id<size ? *vect[id] : *(cModule *)NULL;}
00218 
00222     void setSystemModule(cModule *p);
00223 
00227     cModule *getSystemModule() const  {return systemmodp;}
